Mod.name: Overcast 2 .0! - A Spells Mod
Mod.description:
v2.0.0
Adds 105 spells into the game. Contains spells for all kinds of uses.
Shoot poison darts or turn projectiles into black holes that suck in other projectiles.
Also included, are a set of powerful Selection spells which
allow you to select entities and perform actions on them from any distance.
NOTE: MAY BE INCOMPATABLE WITH SOME MODS EDITING gun.lua.
The OVERCAST spell which does this can be disabled in config if needed.
LOAD AFTER Esoteric Arcana!!!
